meanings.sent1: The haircutters at the salon are very skilled.
meanings.sent2: I need to make an appointment with the haircutters for a trim.
meanings.sent3: The haircutters had a competition to see who could create the wildest hairstyle.
meanings.sent4: Her scissors moved swiftly like the hands of a skilled haircutters.
meanings.sent5: The haircutters transformed my messy hair into a stylish look.
